# Vignette builder

Vignettes are built by only a few proceces (see [A note to devtools users](http://yihui.name/knitr/demo/vignette/)). In my experience, the process that works is: 

- `devtools::use_vignette("vignettefilename")`

- Update yaml accordingly (vignette title can be different than vignettefilename)

- If necessary, clean and rebuild.

- Check

- `devtools::build_vignettes()` (or ensure vignettes are build during chekc or build source)

- Build source

- `devtools::install(build_vignettes = TRUE)`

- To access a vignette use `vignette("vignettefilename")` (no need to specify the package, as all vignettes seem to be in a same index).

If installing from github, use `devtools::install_github("username/repo", build_vignettes = TRUE)`.
